author: Special Correspondent
text: The city police have arrested a youth from Malappuram on the charge of sedition for posting a disparaging comment on Facebook about NSG commando Lt. Col. E.K. Niranjan Kumar. Anwar Sadhik’s comment went like this: “So one more trouble goes. Now his wife will be offered a job and financial assistance. Ordinary people get nothing. A rotten democracy.”
title: Youth held for abusive post
